titleStmt.title: Tvvo letters the one from his Excellencie, Robert Earl of Essex, to Anthony Nicoll, Esquire, a member of the House of Commons : the other from VVarwick-castle to Sir Samuel Luke at his quarters, concerning the state of the city of Gloucester.
titleStmt.author: Essex, Robert Devereux, Earl of, 1591-1646.
Bridges, Jo.

notesStmt.note: The second letter signed: Jo: Bridges.
Place of publication suggested by Wing.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
